entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1500 metres this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:30 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 1:30 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
